fields.name: OTP Host
fields.description: This option sets the texting service address used to send SMS message for OTP authentication.

fields.name: OTP Validity
fields.description: This option sets the validity period, in seconds, of the OTP token.

fields.name: OTP SMS Message
fields.value: Please enter your One-Time-Password (OTP) {token} to {action}. This OTP is valid for 5 minutes.  Message sent on {time}. Reference Number: {ref_number}.
fields.description: This option sets the SMS message for OTP authentication on log-in.

fields.name: Require OTP on Log-in
fields.description: This option enables or disables OTP authentication on log-in. Individual user accounts have the option to bypass the OTP authentication from the account model.

fields.name: Require OTP on Change Password
fields.description: This option enables or disables OTP authentication in changing password.
